tooltip.oretopia.romiumsword: §7This was definitely the same sword they used in Wallachia.
tooltip.oretopia.romiumpickaxe: §7Its kinda just like an iron pickaxe but with more durability.
tooltip.oretopia.romiumaxe: §7Dont even bother using this in axe pvp.
tooltip.oretopia.rawuranium: §7A highly radioactive metal used at least in this mod to make explosives. I wouldn't recommend holding it because of the radiation but who cares its minecraft!
tooltip.oretopia.uranium: §7A piece of uranium metal that is still dangerous but not enriched yet.
tooltip.oretopia.enricheduranium: §7Woah, now thats some deadly stuff. Also how are you still alive right now?
tooltip.oretopia.copper: §7A rather soft metal that is very conductive.
tooltip.oretopia.coppernugget: §7Its kinda just a small peice of copper, dont know what you need it for.
tooltip.oretopia.tungsten: §7A metal so tough it can be put in lava and not melt.
tooltip.oretopia.tungstennugget: §7So what if its small its still tough as heck!
tooltip.oretopia.chromium: §7Mainly used to make stuff shiny but its tough as well.
tooltip.oretopia.radioum:
§7A metal so radioactive when in contact with human flesh it withers them away.
When mixed with gunpowder it can produce a deadly explosive.
tooltip.oretopia.cobalt: §7haha funny blue metal just use chromium lol
tooltip.oretopia.oretopium: §7Oh look, the mod creator made an ore with the mod name because he ran out of ideas!
tooltip.oretopia.oretopiumnugget: §7honestly why do you even need this
tooltip.oretopia.rawbaconite: §7Who knew bacon could be generated underground?
